name: Provident Sunworth City
description: Provident Sunworth City is a large 60-acre township on Mysore Road / NICE junction offering premium 2 & 3 BHK apartments with thoughtful amenities, landscaped greens and easy connectivity to Bangalore city and suburbs.

highlights.title: Large 60-Acre Township
highlights.description: Expansive township spread over 60 acres in Mysore Road / NICE junction for a community-like living experience.

highlights.title: 2 & 3 BHK Apartments
highlights.description: Modern apartments in 2 & 3 BHK configurations, suitable for families and investors alike.

highlights.title: Excellent Connectivity
highlights.description: Located on Mysore Road near NICE junction; close to Kengeri / Mysore Road highways and public transport links.

highlights.title: Ready to Move / Ongoing Flats
highlights.description: Some towers ready, others under development — flexible options depending on buyer preference.

highlights.title: Spacious Green Township Layout
highlights.description: Township planning with open spaces, green zones, amenities, and community-style living.

locationMap.address: Near NICE Junction, Mysore Road, Kengeri, Bangalore - 560060

landmarks.name: Major Schools & Hospitals around Mysore Road

faq.question: What are the available units?
faq.answer: 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments of various sizes.

faq.question: Is the project ready to move?
faq.answer: Some towers are ready, others are ongoing — check availability on inquiry.

faq.question: Where is Provident Sunworth City located?
faq.answer: Off Mysore Road near the NICE junction, Kengeri, Bangalore.

faq.question: What amenities are included?
faq.answer: Swimming pool, clubhouse, gym, landscaped gardens, kids play area, security & more.
